welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oakton, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal with domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Main terminal with domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Main terminal with domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and souvenir shops.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is a small building with basic amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used by military and government officials for official travel.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
